landing.slogan: Your path to the world of IT

intro.title: Dreaming of a career in IT?
text: Digitalents Academy is a modern and creative learning environment for 17 to 29 year old unemployed jobseekers from Helsinki. Here you will get to know the basics of programming and learn use those skills in practice and work projects. You don’t need to have previous experience from IT. Your studies will be customized to match your interests and wishes. For example you could focus on web development, design, or even fully immerse yourself in game development.

blocks.title: Practice and work on real projects
blocks.text: Because things are best learned by doing. We will give you a modern work environment where you can study by yourself and also participate in group projects.

blocks.title: Supportive colleagues
blocks.text: It’s more fun to tackle problems together. While learning code you get to share your experiences and learn from your peers as well.

blocks.title: Helpful staff
blocks.text: Ask anything, anytime! During your stay you will be supported by instructors and a coach that will seek to help you with everything they can.

blocks.title: Guidance onwards
blocks.text: While here your working skills will grow and your coding abilities develop. You’ll gain valuable experience that will grant you more opportunities in work and education.

blogpreview.title: Take a look at our blog! (Mostly in Finnish)

text.bold: You can apply to Digitalens Academy if you are: between the ages of 17 to 29, living in Helsinki, and listed as an unemployed jobseeker at the unemployment office.
text.normal: The work experience placement will last one to six months, after which we will guide you on a path forward such as education or employment.

text.bold: We accept applications throughout the year and starting dates are the first monday of each month.
text.normal: You can inquire about available spots even after the starting dates by directly contacting our work coach.

text.bold: To apply to Digitalents Academy you need to fill out the Helsinki youth workshops application form. All applicants will be contacted by our staff as soon as possible.

toapply.text: Alta pääset työpajojen yhteiseen hakulomakkeeseen. Ensisijaista toivetta työpajasta kysyttäessä valitse “Yrityksissä tapahtuva valmennus”. (Digitalents ICT Beginners)
